greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 1's in decimal representation of n.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = a(floor(n/10)) + 1 if n == 1 (mod 10), otherwise a(n) = a(floor(n/10)).
results.author: _Robert Israel_, Feb 09 2016
